title: Elegant Ruby and Diamond Gold Kada - A Timeless Vaiduryam Bracelet
materials: 24 stones). Features a radiant Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Kada features a delicate floral design interspersed with bright round diamonds and rich red ruby gemstone hearts. The gold setting is sleek and modern, showcasing the gemstones while maintaining a slender profile for comfortable wear. The cabochon-cut rubies offer a smooth, tactile feel and a captivating depth of color.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with vibrant ruby red and dazzling white diamonds. A classic and luxurious color combination.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings
or festive celebrations. Can also be worn as a statement piece for evening events.
description: This Kada embodies understated elegance and is a perfect blend of contemporary design with precious gemstones. The high-quality rubies and diamonds ensure lasting value and brilliance. The sleek design ensures comfortable wear. A perfect heirloom piece to pass down through generations.
